text: Foamy in an adjective that describes a foam-like texture. Foamy may also refer to: * Foamy the squirrel, a character in the webtoon, Neurotically Yours * Foamy the Freakadog, a briefly appearing sidekick to the eponymous superhero on the Freakazoid! television show ==See also== * Foam (disambiguation)
title: Foamy (disambiguation)
